all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Continue in these things even unto the end, and you shall have a crown of eternal life at the right hand of my Father, who is full of grace and truth.
Doctrine and Covenants 66:12
Quote of the Day
"The Aaronic Priesthood is called the preparatory priesthood … because its ordinances allow [young men] to experience the weight and joy of being on the Lord’s errand."
President Steven J. Lund | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
